CustomField.description: Field used to identify if a contact is showing as a SIM on the site account
CustomField.formula:
IF(OR(
Account.Site_Super_User_1__c = Id , Account.Site_Super_User_2__c = Id), TRUE,FALSE)

CustomField.label: SIM on Site Account?
